name: Beauties and the Beast
description:
Play as Beast from Beauty and the Beast to woo your choice of five women. Be sure to gain their affections within a week, or else you will be cursed to remain a beast forever.

Credits:

Game Design: Sam Riordan, Roger Liu, Francisco Rojo, Joe Cossins, Miguel Gatmaytan, Matthew Bofenkamp

Programming: Roger Liu, Francisco Rojo

Character Art: Joe Cossins

Background Art: Matthew Bofenkamp

UI Design: Joe Cossins, Sam Riordan

Writing: Sam Riordan

Production: Miguel Gatmaytan

Voice Acting: Kayleah Lewis (Noelle and Lucille), Sam Riordan (Pat), Miguel Gatmaytan (Beauregard)
